title: Harvest Blueberries
description: The blueberry bushes near the greenhouse are ready to harvest. Collect them before the season changes to ensure we have enough preserves for the Winter!

title: Slime Hunt
description: The mine has an infestation of green slimes. We need someone to clear out at least 10 slimes to keep our adventurers safe.

title: Milk the Cows
description: Our cows are ready to be milked. We need fresh milk for the upcoming festival. Remember to keep them happy and well-fed!

title: Catch a Tuna
description: Willy needs a fresh tuna for a special dish heâ€™s preparing. Catch one and bring it to him before the day ends!

title: Collect Hardwood
description: Robin needs 10 pieces of hardwood to repair some furniture. Search the secret woods or chop down mahogany trees to collect enough.

title: Ship 50 Crops
description: Pierre is looking for a bulk shipment of fresh crops for his new marketing campaign. Any kind of crops will do!
